title: Trouble with new patch
body: Well my league was working fine. Until i logged out . And then just errors started popping out when i tried to acces store or hextech crafting system.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing some connection issues to the Hextech crafting and store servers. I recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with League by following our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
